title: The Aldebaran Campaign
description: THE MAN...Tony Fetterman, combat-hardened veteran of the Tau Ceti campaign. Roused from cold sleep for one purpose only...THE MISSION...Deep in enemy territory on the jungle planet called Aldebaran II, the alien army is holding human prisoners... and some are from Fetterman's old squad.THE OBJECTIVE...Bring them home, any way he can.
author: Kevin D. Randle
